thing-type.label: VOC-SENSOR Air Quality Sensor
thing-type.description: Air Quality Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtZ-Wave sensor in an ultra slim design housing provides comprehensive information on indoor air quality.</p&gt <p&gtBased on these information it is possible to always ensure a healthy living climate.</p&gt <p&gt• Ultra-flat design housing</p&gt <p&gt• Use of high-precision, Swiss sensor technology</p&gt <p&gt• Multicolor LED for signalling ventilation recommendations</p&gt <p&gt• Returns the following values:</p&gt <p&gt- VOC value (volatile organic compounds) in ppm</p&gt <p&gt- CO2 value (as CO2 equivalent) in ppm</p&gt <p&gt- Temperature (°C) and humidity (%)</p&gt <p&gt- Dew point (°C)</p&gt <p&gt• Supports Z-Wave Plus S2 security (encryption)</p&gt <p&gt• Z-Wave repeater function</p&gt <p&gt• Operation with plug-in power supply unit</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the back button three times within 1 second.</p&gt <p&gtWhile the inclusion is active, the LED is blinking green. If the inclusion was successful the green LED will light up for 5 seconds. Otherwise the red led will light up for 5 seconds to indicate failure.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the back button three times within 1 second.</p&gt <p&gtWhile the exclusion is active, the LED is blinking green. If the exclusion was successful the green LED will light up for 5 seconds. Otherwise the red led will light up for 5 seconds to indicate failure.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtn/a</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Temperature on-change reporting
parameter.description: Temperature on-change reporting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No on-change reporting (only time-based reports).</p&gt <p&gt0x01 - 0x32 report if temperature changed by delta = 0,1°C - 5,0°C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Humidity on-change reporting
parameter.description: Humidity on-change reporting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No on-change reporting (only time-based reports)</p&gt <p&gt0x01 - 0x0A report if humidity changed by delta = 1% ...10%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Unit Temperature
parameter.description: Unit for Temperature (Celsius or Fahrenheit)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 Temperature reports in Celsius </p&gt <p&gt0x01 Temperature reports in Fahrenheit</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Resolution Temperature
parameter.description: Resolution for Temperature<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No resolution (example 22°C)</p&gt <p&gt0x01 1/10 resolution (example 22.3°C)</p&gt <p&gt0x02 1/100 resolution (example 22.35°C)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Resolution Humidity
parameter.description: Resolution Humidity<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No resolution (example 33%)</p&gt <p&gt0x01 1/10 resolution (example 33.4%)</p&gt <p&gt0x02 1/100 resolution (example 33.45%)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: VOC on-change reporting
parameter.description: VOC on-change reporting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No on-change reporting (only time-based reports)</p&gt <p&gt0x01 - 0x0A report if VOC reading changed by 100ppb - 1000ppb</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: CO2eq on-change reporting
parameter.description: CO2eq on-change reporting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No on-change reporting (only time-based reports)</p&gt <p&gt0x01 - 0x0A report if CO2eq reading changed by 100ppm - 1000ppm</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Air quality indication via LED
parameter.description: Air quality indication via LED<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 No air quality indication via LEDs</p&gt <p&gt0x01 Indicate measured air quality via LEDs </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: Air Quality Sensor Z-Wave Plus can be associated with other devices.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtCommands:</p&gt <p&gtDEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION,NOTIFICATION_REPORT,SENSOR_MULTILEVEL_REPORT</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Temperature
parameter.description: Air Quality Sensor Z-Wave Plus can be associated with other devices.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtCommand: SENSOR_MULTILEVEL_REPORT</p&gt
